survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Pet Food Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and preferences regarding subscription-based pet food delivery services, including delivery experience, product quality, and service flexibility.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based pet food delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based pet food delivery service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you in a pet food subscription service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to identify key priorities for customers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes) with a maximum of 3 selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you in a pet food subscription service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How often do you typically adjust your subscription plan (e.g., change delivery frequency, product selection, or pause/cancel)?
questions.client_notes: Helps assess how customers interact with subscription flexibility.

script.question_text: How often do you typically adjust your subscription plan (e.g., change delivery frequency, product selection, or pause/cancel)?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current pet food subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide qualitative insights for service enhancement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current pet food subscription service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current pet food subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) can be derived from this question.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current pet food subscription service to a friend or colleague?
